original_text: He went into the temple. He took the special bread that was there. It is against God's Law for anyone except the priests to eat that bread. But David ate some of it. He gave some of the bread to his men to eat as well.’
korean_text: 그가 하나님의 전에 들어가서 다만 제사장 외에는 먹어서는 안 되는 진설병을 먹고 함께 한 자들에게도 주지 아니하였느냐

sentences.original_text: He took the special bread that was there.
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그곳에 있던 특별한 떡을 가져갔습니다.

sentences.original_text: for anyone except the priests to eat that bread.
sentences.korean_translation: 제사장 외의 누구도 그 떡을 먹어서는 안 됩니다.

sentences.original_text: But David ate some of it.
He gave some of the bread to his men
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그 떡을 그의 사람들에게 주었습니다.
